skill.name: Medical God's Pride
skill.value: Restores 2268/2708 HP to 2 allies with the lowest percentage of HP and cures them of all negative status effects.

ability.name: Resourceful Doctor (Lv. 50)
ability.value: Sharply increases crit rate of allies targeted by skill in low chance.

ability.name: God of Medicine (Lv. 78)
ability.value: Restores the allies targeted by skill with 100% HP in moderate chance.
